title: Rewriting the Number
text: When we separate the number 9,258,137,904,061 by its commas, it can be rewritten as 9,000,000,000+258,000,000,000+137,000,000,000+904,000+61.

title: Rewriting the Number
text: This is the same thing as 9 $$trillion+258$$ $$billion+137$$ $$million+904$$ $$thousand+61$$.
